name: Admin: Atualizar Perfil de Usuário
sql:
SELECT u.rowid, u.USER_ID, u.USERNAME, u.EMAIL, u.IS_ACTIVE, u.LAST_LOGIN
FROM app_users u
WHERE u.EMAIL = :user_email

name: Estoque: Ajustar Quantidade de Produto
sql:
SELECT p.rowid, p.PRODUCT_ID, p.PRODUCT_NAME, s.STOCK_QUANTITY, s.LOCATION
FROM products p, stock s
WHERE p.PRODUCT_ID = s.PRODUCT_ID AND p.PRODUCT_ID = :product_id

name: Pedidos: Alterar Status de Pedido
sql:
SELECT o.rowid, o.ORDER_ID, c.CUSTOMER_NAME, o.ORDER_DATE, o.STATUS, o.SHIPPING_DATE
FROM orders o, customers c
WHERE o.CUSTOMER_ID = c.CUSTOMER_ID AND o.ORDER_ID = :order_id
